ideas.title: Real-time Configuration Streaming
ideas.description: Implement WebSocket-based real-time configuration streaming for instant updates across all connected clients without polling. This would enable true real-time configuration synchronization for distributed systems.

ideas.title: Configuration Versioning & Rollback
ideas.description: Add Git-like versioning system for configurations with branching, merging, and point-in-time rollback capabilities. This would enable safe configuration experimentation and easy recovery from bad deployments.

ideas.title: AI-Powered Configuration Optimization
ideas.description: Implement machine learning algorithms to automatically optimize configuration parameters based on performance metrics, usage patterns, and system behavior. This would enable self-tuning configurations.

ideas.title: Multi-Cloud Platform Support
ideas.description: Extend platform integration to support AWS, Azure, and GCP cloud platforms with cloud-specific optimizations, auto-scaling, and cloud-native configuration patterns.

ideas.title: Configuration Compliance & Governance
ideas.description: Add compliance checking, audit trails, and governance controls for configuration changes. This would enable enterprise-grade configuration management with approval workflows and policy enforcement.

ideas.title: Edge Computing Framework Support
ideas.description: Extend platform support to include edge computing frameworks like Azure IoT Edge, AWS Greengrass, and Google Edge TPU with edge-specific configuration patterns and offline capabilities.

ideas.title: Configuration Templates & Wizards
ideas.description: Create intelligent configuration templates and wizards that guide users through complex configuration setup with validation, best practices, and automated optimization suggestions.

ideas.title: Cross-Platform UI Component Library
ideas.description: Develop a unified UI component library that works across all supported platforms (MAUI, Avalonia, Blazor) with platform-specific optimizations and consistent design patterns.
